paper_abstract: This paper demonstrates that magnitude squared incoherence (MSI) analysis is efficient to localize hot spots, i.e., points at which focused electromagnetic (EM) analyses can be applied with success. It is also demonstrated that MSI may be applied to enhance differential EM analyses (DEMA) based on difference of means (DoM).
paper_title: Enhancing Electromagnetic Analysis Using Magnitude Squared Incoherence
